{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Smart Cloud NightView Camera |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ |sp = https://www.asus.com/supportonly/AiCam/ |dl = https://www.asus.com/supportonly/AiCam/HelpDesk_Download/ |wikidevi = ASUS_AiCam |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = AiCam |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless camera |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 128 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2size = 64 |ram2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = AC:22:0B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = micro USB |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = IR LED, microphone, speaker |addchip = 720p Image Sensor Module;OmniVision;OV9712;;1; ,,, 1080p 30fps H.264 Camera Codec with HDR ISP;GEO Semiconductor;MAX64380;;1; ,,, 16-Bit Mono Audio Voice Codec;Maxim;MAX9860;;1; ,,, Mono 2.6W Class D Audio Power Amplifier;Maxim;MAX98300;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/22/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01EY64REK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Model Name: AiCam *MP Date: 2015 *Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A WiSoC *Video Processor: ''GEO Semiconductor'' MAX64380 *Audio Codec/PA: ''Maxim'' MAX9860/MAX98300 (AAC) *Memory Size (Flash/RAM): :System: Flash: 128MB (NAND); RAM: 128MB (DDR2) :Video: Flash: 128KB; RAM: 64MB (DDR2) *Wireless: 802.11b/g/n, 2x internal antennas :Encryption: WEP, WPA2-PSK, WPA-PSK, WPS *Connectors: DC input (micro USB), MIC, Speaker *Microphone: 1x Built-in directional microphone *Speaker Power: 0.5W *Image Sensor: ''OmniVision'' OV9712 :720p/30fps, 1/4 inch, 3.3V/(Lux/sec) *Lens: Lens Field of View, Composition: IR cut :Sunny optical 3508B-200; Vertical: 57.7°; :Horizontal: 44.9°; Diagonal: 69.2°, F 2.8 *IR LED: 2x high power (6m distance) *Focus: Fixed focus, EFL 3.29 mm *Zoom: 4x digital zoom *Video protocols: H.264, MJPEG, CGI Command :HTTP/HTTPS, RTP/RTPS over UDP, TCP, HTTP *Recorded File type: MP4 :Audio File: MP3 (48KHz/16bits) *DC Power Adapter: AC Input / DC Output :AC input: 100~240V (50~60Hz) :DC outout: 5V with max. 1.2A current
==See also== *[[ASUS AiCam 2]] - ''Smart Cloud Camera'' • [https://www.unifore.net/ip-video-surveillance/asus-aicam-alternative-d1000-smart-wifi-ip-camera.html PR] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ PPage] *[[ASUS HG100]] - ''Smart Home Gateway'' • [http://armdevices.net/2016/02/18/asus-hg100-rk3066-smart-home-gateway-via-zigbeewifi-bluetooth/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/news/4305/asus-debuts-smart-home-series-using-zigbee-2/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/product/6285/product-introduction-asus-smart-home-gateway-hg100/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/sg/Internet-of-Things/ASUS-SmartHome-Gateway-HG100/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RK903 MSQ-RK903] (2015-04-02), CPU: ''Rockchip'' RK3066 @1.5GHz :Flash/RAM: 8/1GB, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, ZigBee, HDMI 2.0 (4K H.265) *ASUS Reco Classic Dash Cam (Full HD 1080p) - B0105TLZB8 *ASUS Reco Smart Dash Cam & Portable Cam - B075GHGNGX
[[Category:English Documentation]]
